descriptionHtml:
==========================================
======== Readable Dragon Alphabet ========
============================= ver. 0.1 ===

Author: 175 (ScalyFolk821)
Sorry my poor English.

=== Description

\"Readable Dragon Alphabet\" is a single SWF that adds tiny ruby (rubi, or Furigana) to Dragon Alphabets.
- Words of Power in Magic Menu
- Words in HUD when you learned new Word of Power
- And any other dragon alphabets
- Except Dragon Alphabet inscribed on a Word Wall
You can pronounce Dragon Language a little bit easily, this makes Dragon Alphabet shrinked a bit, though.
For actual difference, see Images tab.


=== Compatibility

- fontconfig.txt maybe conflicts with other mods altering any kinds of UI fonts
(But you can strike a balance with careful manual installation)
- In too small display resolution (e.g. 640*480), this may be worthless


=== Installation

If you have NOT installed any other mods altering fonts

- Install DragonFutura.swf and fontconfig.txt to Skyrim\\Data\\Interface with Wrye Smash, NMM or manually


If you have any other mods altering fonts...

- Make a backup copy of fontconfig.txt in Skyrim\\Data\\Interface
- Install DragonFutura.swf to Skyrim\\Data\\Interface manually
- Open existing fontconfig.txt with your text editor
- add this line to fontconfig.txt (recommended after last \"fontlib ...\" line)

fontlib \"Interface\\DragonFutura.swf\"

- and, change this line

map \"$DragonFont\" = \"Dragon_script\" Normal
into
map \"$DragonFont\" = \"DragonFutura\" Normal

- save fontconfig.txt


=== Uninstallation

- delete DragonFutura.swf
- delete fontconfig.txt or, restore your backup of fontconfig.txt


=== Version History

2012/03/08 0.1
Initial Release


=== Acknowledgements

- Dragon Alphabet table on UESP (http://www.uesp.net/wiki/Lore:Dragon_Alphabet)
- Great thanks to Bethesda for creating great game Skyrim.


=== Permission

You can redistribute, change & upload, or use this for other mods, but my permission is required.
First of all, find 175 (ScalyFolk821) on Nexus or twitter (https://twitter.com/#!/175_175), and please contact me.
